commit.message:
Integrate Bootswatch and improve API handling

- Added `WebSpark.Bootswatch` and `WebSpark.HttpClientUtility` packages for dynamic theme switching and enhanced HTTP client utilities.
- Updated `RemoteController` with `[Consumes("application/json")]` and `[FromBody]` for better API content type handling.
- Refactored `PollyController` to use `HttpClient.PostAsync` with JSON serialization and added detailed logging.
- Integrated Bootswatch services and middleware in `Program.cs` and updated `_Layout.cshtml` to dynamically load themes.
- Removed redundant custom styles, scripts, and dependencies related to theming, simplifying the project.
- Updated `appsettings.json` with Bootswatch and Polly configuration options.
- Simplified `build.js` by removing Bootstrap Icons font copying, as they are now loaded via CDN.
- Updated `package.json` to remove unused dependencies and ensure compatibility with the new theming system.
- Added detailed documentation and scripts for testing and troubleshooting API and build issues.
Refactor OpenWeatherMap models to use required properties for better null safety; update Bootstrap license in site.min.js.LICENSE.txt; add AssemblyInfo.cs for test parallelization configuration.

feat: Implement comprehensive educational platform for async/await patterns

- Added new learning page at `/home/learn` with structured modules for Beginner, Intermediate, and Advanced paths.
- Created detailed interactive modules covering key async concepts such as cancellation tokens, parallel execution, and resilience patterns.
- Developed new API controllers to demonstrate focused async patterns with real-world scenarios.
- Enhanced documentation with clear learning objectives, code references, and common pitfalls.
- Updated existing controllers and views to emphasize learning outcomes and improve navigation.
- Introduced extensive test suites to validate async patterns and ensure robust implementation.

Enhance encoding, UI, and middleware functionality

- Added `EncodingMiddleware` to enforce UTF-8 encoding for all responses.
- Updated `Program.cs` to include `UseEncodingMiddleware` and simplified memory cache health checks.
- Redesigned `Error.cshtml` with Bootstrap cards and alerts for improved UX.
- Upgraded Bootstrap and Bootstrap Icons to latest versions (5.3.3, 1.11.3).
- Replaced Unicode emojis in `README.md` with ASCII-safe markers to fix encoding issues.
- Updated `web.config` to ensure UTF-8 encoding for IIS responses.
- Changed header handling in `RequestLoggingMiddleware` for safer operations.
- Made `BuildVersion` nullable in `ApplicationStatus.cs` to handle unset scenarios.
- Removed unused `System.Text.Json` package from `OpenWeatherMapClient.csproj`.
- Added performance optimizations in `webpack.config.js` for asset size limits.
- Improved documentation with guides for Bootstrap updates and encoding fixes.

Upgrade to .NET 10 and migrate from Swagger to Scalar

Upgraded all projects to target .NET 10, updating `TargetFramework` to `net10.0` and incrementing assembly versions. Updated NuGet dependencies to their latest versions compatible with .NET 10.

Replaced Swagger/Swashbuckle with Scalar for API documentation. Introduced `Scalar.AspNetCore` and replaced `CustomSwaggerExtensions.cs` with `CustomScalarExtensions.cs`. Updated `Program.cs` to use Scalar methods and removed the `swagger-ui` folder.

Customized Scalar UI with a "Back to Home" button and enhanced API descriptions. Updated `launchSettings.json` to set `/scalar/v1` as the default launch URL. Updated UI references in `Index.cshtml` and `_Layout.cshtml` to point to Scalar endpoints.

Overhauled documentation, including `README.md`, and added detailed migration guides (`MIGRATION_TO_SCALAR.md`, etc.). Improved XML documentation in `AsyncDemo.Web.xml` for comprehensive API coverage.

Performed thorough testing to validate Scalar endpoints and removed all Swagger references. Cleaned up outdated code and ensured the project is maintainable and future-ready.

Merge pull request #4 from markhazleton/upgrade-to-NET10

Upgrade to Net 10

Update NuGet packages and adjust OpenAPI usage

Updated several NuGet package versions in `AsyncDemo.Tests.csproj`:
- `Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk` to 18.0.1
- `MSTest.TestAdapter` and `MSTest.TestFramework` to 4.0.2

In `AsyncDemo.Web.csproj`, updated:
- `Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Resilience` to 10.0.0
- `Swashbuckle.AspNetCore` to 10.0.0
- Added `Microsoft.OpenApi` version 2.3.0

Modified `CustomSwaggerExtensions.cs` to use `Microsoft.OpenApi`
instead of `Microsoft.OpenApi.Models`, aligning with the new
package addition and potentially reorganizing OpenAPI usage.
Add XML documentation comments to resolve CS1591 warnings
Complete .NET 10 upgrade - Updated all projects and packages to .NET 10
Commit changes before fixing global.json file(s).

Refactor for DI, logging, and security improvements

Refactored BaseController to follow DI best practices using ILogger and IHttpClientFactory. Updated BulkCallsController and OpenWeatherController to align with the new BaseController pattern. Enhanced HomeController with improved error handling and logging.

Introduced RequestLoggingMiddleware for structured request/response logging. Added ConfigurationValidationService and StartupService for configuration validation and initialization tasks. Enhanced health checks with configuration validation and memory cache checks.

Improved HTTP client configuration with default timeouts and removed anti-patterns. Added security headers, HSTS, and forwarded headers support. Enhanced session management with secure cookie settings.

Updated Program.cs to register new services and middleware. Improved logging configuration with structured logging and graceful shutdown handling. Added XML documentation for new features and created IMPROVEMENTS_SUMMARY.md.

Improved maintainability, reliability, and observability by following modern .NET best practices.

Upgrade package dependencies across all projects

Updated package references in `AsyncDemo.Tests.csproj`, `AsyncDemo.Web.csproj`, `AsyncDemo.csproj`, and `OpenWeatherMapClient.csproj` to newer versions for improved compatibility, bug fixes, and security enhancements. Key updates include:

- Upgraded `Microsoft.Extensions.*` packages to version `9.0.10`.
- Upgraded `Azure.Identity` to version `1.17.0`.
- Upgraded `Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk` to version `18.0.0`.
- Upgraded MSTest packages to version `4.0.1`.
- Upgraded `Polly` to version `8.6.4` and `Swashbuckle.AspNetCore` to version `9.0.6`.

These changes ensure consistency and alignment across all projects.

Update NuGet packages and clean up code

Updated project files for `AsyncDemo.Tests`, `AsyncDemo.Web`, `AsyncDemo`, and `OpenWeatherMapClient` to reference the latest versions of various NuGet packages. Removed an unused `using` directive in `BulkCallsController.cs` for improved code cleanliness. These changes ensure the project benefits from the latest features and fixes.

Update NuGet packages and refactor tests

Updated several NuGet package versions across the `AsyncDemo` project and its components, including key libraries such as `Microsoft.Extensions` and `Azure.Identity`. Removed the `PerformActionWithLock_ShouldPerformAction` test method from `MemoryCacheManagerTests.cs`. Additionally, created or updated the solution file `AsyncDemo.sln` to enhance project configuration and management in Visual Studio.
